name: RedCube (Ido2609)
description:
Hey you

In this game you play as a red cube and you need to avoid the other blocks to complete the level and move to the next one.

this is my first game and i just want to see where this game will go, for now you have just 2 levels to do, i will add more level really soon in the 10.9.2022 you will see it and maybe you will the level selector too.

If you can just try the 2 levels and tell me more ideas for more levels and tell me if you find any bugs.

(based on brackeys tutorial)

thank you and have a nice day! 3>
